```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(car)
library(emmeans)
library(multcompView)
library(glmmTMB)
library(ggpubr)

```


# DATA

```{r}

giant_rag <- read.csv("All POST_Reduction.csv")

str(giant_rag)

giant_rag$run <- as.factor(giant_rag$run)

giant_rag$pop <- as.factor(giant_rag$pop)

giant_rag$herb <- as.factor(giant_rag$herb)

giant_rag$rate <- as.factor(giant_rag$rate)

giant_rag$rep <- as.factor(giant_rag$rep)

str(giant_rag)

```


# MODEL

```{r}

model <- glmmTMB(bio_red ~ herb * rate + (1|run) + (1|pop), data = giant_rag, beta_family(link = "logit"))

```


# SUMMARY

```{r, echo=TRUE}

summary(model)

```


# ANOVA

```{r, echo=TRUE}

glmmTMB:::Anova.glmmTMB(model)

```


# EMM & CLD

```{r, echo=TRUE}

emm_herb_rate <- emmeans(model, ~ herb|rate, adjust = "none", type = "response", contr = "pairwise")

emm_herb_rate

CLD_emm_herb_rate <- if(requireNamespace("multcomp")) {
    multcomp::cld(emm_herb_rate$emmeans, alpha = 0.05, Letters=letters, adjust="none", reversed = TRUE)}

CLD_emm_herb_rate

```


# PLOT

```{r, echo=TRUE}

plot(emm_herb_rate, adjust = "none", comparisons = TRUE) + 
  geom_point(size = -1) +
  geom_text(aes(label = c("b", "a", "c", "b", "a", "a")),
            vjust = -1) +
  labs(title = "Giant Ragweed Biomass Reduction - POST", 
       x = "Biomass Reduction (%)", 
       y = "Herbicide") + 
  theme_classic() + 
  theme (plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", hjust = 0.5, size = 20, colour = "darkgreen"), 
         axis.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 18, colour = "darkgreen"), 
         axis.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12, colour = "black"),
         strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12, colour = "black")) +
  ggsave("BETA Fisher LSD_ALL POP.jpeg", units="in", width=8, height=5, dpi=600)

```
